short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily follow the current market with the live cryptocurrency tracker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
L.C.T is a simple extension that provides the current prices of your favorites currencies as your fingers.
Just 1 click and you are aware of the market changes anywhere anytime you want.

Version 1.2 - may 19th, 2022
+Add improvements
